title: A iust and temperate defence of the fiue books of ecclesiastical policie: written by M. Richard Hooker against an vncharitable letter of certain English Protestants (as they tearme themselues) crauing resolution, in some matters of doctrine, which seeme to ouerthrow the foundation of religion, and the Church amongst vs. Written by William Covel Doctor in Diuinitie, and published by authority. The contents whereof are in the page following.
author: Covell, William, d. 1614?
publisher: Printed by P. Short for Clement Knight, dwelling at the signe of the holy Lambe in Paules church-yard,
